response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed all expectations. This extraordinary item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. I am extending to you the opportunity to own this masterpiece at an exclusive price of $850,000. This offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to quality. I trust that you will appreciate its value beyond mere monetary terms. Should you choose to accept this offer, I assure you of a seamless transaction and unparalleled customer service. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 850000}
